chat_history.message:
Hello,
My product iPhone 13 mini has the above problem:
The delivery person couldn't deliver the package at home due to absence. Package pickup and contact via ups not possible. This is already happened to me with another order from Backmarket, then the package went back to the sender. I want to receive my goods.

Thank you for your help,

Hello, 

The customer has not received the delivery.

Could you please request the parcel back?

Thank you very much.

Yours sincerely,
Kubra, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS

Dear Backcare,

Attatched is the POD of the order.

Regards,
JH
